title: Justicar Syndra or Atlantean Syndra
body:
I can't make up my mind, should I get Justicar {{champion:134}}  (on sale) or get Atlantean {{champion:134}} ?

Thanks

replies.body: atlantean is a far better skin IMO, but if its the cost you're worried about take the justicar skin (kinda uncommon these days in game)
